summary: On October 7th Frank Chaparro was joined by leaders from Apifiny, Ripple, and The Stellar Foundation to discuss the latest developments in international remittance.
title: The Block Presents: The State of International Remittance — Presented by Apifiny
content: On October 7, Frank Chaparro sat down with leaders from Apifiny, Ripple, and The Stellar Foundation to discuss the latest developments in international remittance.
Thomas Trépanier – Head of Business Development, Roxe settlement network by Apifiny
Lisa Nestor – Director, Partnership, Stellar Foundation
Asheesh Birla – SVP of Product and Corporate Development, Ripple
